message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,300,000. I'm confident this represents a fair starting point for negotiations.
I'm really interested in the product, but $1,500,000 is my maximum budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,200,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
